document_data.name: Bregg
document_data.mainbody: '''Bregg''', who was nicknamed '''the Strong''', was a renowned [[Rashemaar berserkers|Rashemaar berserker]] who rebelled against the [[wychlaran]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|189}}, Bregg was passed over by the wychlaran to be named the next [[Iron Lord]] of Rashemen when the previous Iron Lord died. In his fury, Bregg, and those berserkers loyal to him, slew dozens of [[hathran]]s within the first few hours of his rebellion. Bregg and his followers continued to fight until the {{YearlinkName|194}}, when he was killed. As a result of this rebellion, the wychlaran began wearing masks to hide their identities from the public as a safety measure.
